alert.note: Alert for Arenac; Gladwin; Iosco; Ogemaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 1:27AM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Arenac, eastern Gladwin, southeastern Ogemaw and Iosco Counties through 245 AM EDT... At 126 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rhodes, or 13 miles east of Gladwin, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Standish and Sterling around 145 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Maple Ridge, Omer, Twining, Turner, Au Gres, Whittemore, National City, East Tawas, Tawas City, Tawas Point State Park, Oscoda and Au Sable. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Weak rotation is evident on radar, but is strengthening with time and may rise to severe criteria. Be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
